title: Cheese Shop Ecommerce
description: Vanilla Javascript project where you can add cheeses to your basket, change the quantities of each cheese in your basket and see your price total go up and down correspondingly.

title: Random Movie Picker
description: Receive a list of movies from an API, with which you can find a random movie from either all the movies or your favourites list.
